db:abstract.db:para: A tool that registers C++ classes to make them available from QML.

db:article.db:para: qmltyperegistrar generates C++ code to register C++ classes to QML and a .qmltypes file containing a JSON description of the classes.
qmltyperegistrar is an internal tool shipped with Qt Qml. It is meant to be invoked by the build system only, you don't need to execute it directly.
